messages.subject: Olean teen
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 3/10/03 12:40:22 PM Central Standard Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 3/10/03 12:40:22 PM Central Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<<
Pass this on, please. Students have virtually no
rights in public schools. Time to change that. >>

I'm not interested in trying to reform the public school system. I suggest he
leaves it.

Ren
"The sun is shining--the sun is shining. That is the magic. The flowers are
growing--the roots are stirring. That is the magic. Being alive is the
magic--being strong is the magic The magic is in me--the magic is in
me....It's in every one of us."

----Frances Hodgson Burnett
